Text:
function ERU_EP05_05()
    -- .起-1【6年前の3月】「井上アルト」
    SaveData.Title = "井上アルト"

    -- //BG：黒バック
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ I played back the message left by "her" on my smartphone. ]])

    -- //BG：公園
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM06.wav")

    MSG([[ Ah—ah, I wonder if my voice recorded properly. ]])

    MSG([[ Well... even if it didn’t record, it’s probably fine. This is totally just a record for my own satisfaction anyway. ]])

    MSG([[ Where should I start talking? Probably with my roots, after all. ]])

    MSG([[ I, Aruto Inoue, was born as a "female." By the time I was aware of myself, I recognized that I was "female," and of course my hobbies and tastes matched those of girls my age. ]])

    MSG([[ Sometimes I think that if I’d been born into a different family, I probably could have lived normally without any problems... ]])

    MSG([[ But unfortunately, the parents I was born to really wanted a "boy" all along. ]])

    MSG([[ Naturally, they gave me the masculine name “Aruto,” shaped my appearance to look boyish, and never allowed me to live like a girl. ]])

    MSG([[ At first, I listened properly to them. ]])

    MSG([[ But as I grew up, I began to want to live my true self more than the life my parents expected from me. ]])

    MSG([[ Of course, at home I was always scolded. I clearly remember the feeling of losing my place. ]])

    MSG([[ And of course, the problems didn’t stop at home. ]])

    MSG([[ What would people around think if there was someone with a boy’s name and appearance but who is a “female”? ]])

    -- //BU：モブ子ども×３
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("kid1_0007.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Children】
 “Hey, look! Aruto’s wearing some weird outfit again!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("kid1_0008.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Children】
 “Mom said! You’re kinda weird!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("kid1_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Children】
 “Hey! Let’s see what’s under that skirt!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Yeah... I was hated. I was actually hated, and now I understand why. ]])

    MSG([[ Back then, everyone treating the difficult me like a leper was a completely natural consequence. ]])

    MSG([[ What was really painful was... being hated by my school teachers. ]])

    MSG([[ When teachers hate you, bullying becomes almost officially sanctioned. ]])

    MSG([[ The person who coined the word “lynching” was brilliant. Truly, there’s nothing more terrifying than bullying justified as justice. ]])

    MSG([[ Well, as you might expect, bullying happened. That harsh treatment eating away at Aruto Inoue’s heart back then was also a natural consequence. ]])

    MSG([[ Before I knew it, "her" heart filled up with resentment for the world. ]])

    MSG([[ But, you know, there’s always some salvation somewhere. One day, an angel appeared before me. ]])

    -- //BU：ショタミナト（通常）
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_CMI01aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1384.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Big sister... why are you all alone in a place like this?” ]])

    MSG([[ That angel’s name was Minato Ikusa. Yes, the name of the one listening to this voice right now, or so I want to believe. ]])

    MSG([[ ...Just kidding. Surely you don’t remember meeting me at all. ]])

    MSG([[ But for me, it was a shock that changed the world. It was a shock that colored what had been a monochrome world at once. ]])

    MSG([[ Minato, on a rarely visited corner of the park, said this to me who was dressed like a girl. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1385.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Big sister, you’re so cute... so why are you hiding in a corner?” ]])

    MSG([[ For the first time, I felt recognized by the world. I felt like I was told, “It’s okay for you to live.” ]])

STOP_BGM(1500)

    MSG([[ So on that day, no matter what happens from then on, I vowed to protect Minato alone. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask008" , 500,false)

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG003aa")

    -- //BU：ショタミナト（泣き）、モブ子ども×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB03aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_CMI01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask008",500,true)

PLAY_BGM("BGM18.wav",0,true)

PLAY_VOICE("brat_0001.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Brat】
 “Ha ha! Crybaby Minato!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("brat_0002.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Brat】
 “The scary sister isn't here today, right? We’ll get back at you!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1386.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Uuuu... stop... don’t hit me!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0168.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “Hey! You guys! If you bully Mina-chan, I won’t let it go!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("brat_0003.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Brat】
 “Gyah!? A g-<r=おんなおとこ>femboy</r>! Run away!” ]])

    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(55,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,-600,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0169.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “Minato, are you okay? I keep telling you not to come to the park when Marika can’t be here.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1387.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “S-sorry, Aruto big sister.” ]])

    MSG([[ Then I started protecting that angel-like boy in the park from bullies. ]])

    MSG([[ I’m way more experienced in being bullied. ]])

    MSG([[ Back then, I had become quite tough mentally and physically, so I wasn’t about to lose to some younger kids. ]])

    MSG([[ Before I knew it, together with his sister Marika, we became the ones watching over Minato. ]])

    -- //BU：ロリマリカ（通常）
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_CMA01aa")
    -- SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)
    LAYER_ALPHA(50,0)
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,-200,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,255,500,Ease.OutSine)
    WAIT(500)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0034.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 “So you’re the famous big sister Aruto.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0170.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “Ah, you really look just like Minato. Are you the Marika big sister?” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_CMA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-200,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0035.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 “Yes, I’m Marika from the class next to yours. Nice to meet you, Al-chan.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Naturally, I also got along well with Marika who was in a similar situation. ]])

    MSG([[ Marika was popular at school even then. Because I became friends with Marika, the bullying against me naturally decreased. ]])

    MSG([[ Of course... behind the scenes, various things were said, and I never got along with my parents. ]])

    -- //CG：アルメリアの誕生
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV040aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1388.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Yeah, that outfit really suits Aruto big sister! It’s so cute!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0171.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “I-is that so...? Mina-chan, Mari-chan, thank you so much for giving me such wonderful clothes.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0036.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 “Hehe. If Al-chan wears them, I think my clothes are happy too.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0037.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 “Al-chan is so cute. I want you to wear many more kinds of clothes.” ]])

    MSG([[ You siblings brought clothes to me who couldn’t wear girls’ clothes at home... every chance you got. ]])

    MSG([[ I’ll never forget the first time you let me wear those clothes. ]])

    MSG([[ You both praised and accepted me, but having always been ridiculed by others, I couldn’t help but feel uneasy and weakly vented. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0172.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “B-but... is it really okay for someone like me to wear such cute clothes? You see, my name is 'Aruto,' and my hairstyle and face look boyish.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0173.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “I feel kind of sorry for the clothes.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0038.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 “Hehe. Al-chan, you’re funny. You don’t need to think that at all.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1389.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Aruto big sister, do you hate your own name?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0174.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “Well... yeah. It’s clearly a name meant for a boy.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0039.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 “Hey Al-chan, don’t you want Minato to try dressing like a girl next?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0175.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “As expected of Marika, we think alike. Actually, I’ve been thinking the same thing.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1390.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Eh!? M-me wearing girls’ clothes!? N-no way! That’s embarrassing!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0176.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “Don’t say that! Please! I’ll do really cute makeup for you!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0040.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 “Trying out girls’ makeup and clothes might be useful later on? Experience is important.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_1391.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Eeeh!? If you really want me to... okay, but...” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("armeria_0177.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aruto】
 “Yay, Marika!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0041.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 “Let’s do it as soon as tomorrow, Al-chan!” ]])

    MSG([[ Hehe, Minato’s reaction the first time he got crossdressed was so cute... ]])

    MSG([[ I believe Minato’s crossdressing started out so good because those experiences are etched in his memory. ]])

    MSG([[ Not that he learned from scratch, but that he’s just recalling forgotten knowledge. ]])

    MSG([[ After that, the three of us played together and did all sorts of things. ]])

    MSG([[ Even now, I sometimes think those were the happiest times. ]])

    MSG([[ Minato and Marika were always by my side, so I was able to laugh much more than before. ]])

    MSG([[ But... this is completely my own flaw: ]])

    MSG([[ I started to feel jealous of Marika. ]])

    MSG([[ Natural beauty, charisma, intelligence. And an adorable little brother. ]])

    MSG([[ Marika had everything I desperately wanted, and I, who had nothing, couldn’t help but envy her. ]])

    MSG([[ I should have been satisfied just having Minato beside me. Humans really are greedy. ]])

--STOP_BGM(2000)

    MSG([[ And perhaps as punishment for my greed—I lost everything that day. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_06")
end
